This is the encyclopaedia. As you progress in the game, information about the world around you will be added here, sorted by topic.
About the encyclopaedia
Trader: get inside the army post and steal the case containing the report of the military expedition to the northern part of the Zone.

Zealot: Help defend against the mercenaries who came to the greenies and demanded to clear off the camp. Everyone hides so the camp looks deserted, we let the mercenaries inside the camp, then attack on captain's order.
Guide's PDA
Встреча с доктором
Doctor: I will be waiting for a man who comes from Sharpshooter in the Sharpshooter's gang's hiding place. If he's our man, he'll know the place.
OK, I'll meet with Ghost's man. I will be waiting for him in Sharpshooter's hiding place. If he's one of our own, he will know where to look for me. Doctor.
Yesterday one brother went to scout the deserted mill and we haven't heard from him since. We need to go there and see where he disappeared to.

Wolf: bring the dynamite stolen by the bandits at the factory. To help you, there are scouts under the bridge, come to them and say "Hello from the underworld" - that's the password. Lead them into battle.
Wolf: clear the bandits at the factory with the help of my scouts behind the bridge, then return and report.
Kill Sharpshooter.
Trader: Fox has come back from his raid and is asking for help. Perhaps he knows something about Sharpshooter.
Fox: Gray is sitting in the hangar at the dump, he knows more about Sharpshooter.
Trader: steal the expedition report from the military at Agroprom research institute and take them to "100 Roentgen" bar, give to the barman.

Tolik's diary. Trader sent us to spy on the military at Agroprom research institute. Got there and shot everybody, bandits and military alike. Dug out some interesting stuff, I'm sending the rest in a cipher *gibberish that looks like a cipher*
Gray to Fox: one guy I know asked to meet a group of stalkers who sniffed out Sharpshooter's hiding place. I'll be at the dump, come over if you want.
Trader: there is a Meatgrinder anomaly field closeby. There is an artifact in its centre. Get it.
There's a very strange anomaly here. It looks like it's moving. I'll try to calculate it's movement time and path, because I don't have the cash to pay the soldiers for passage.
I left a small cache at the deserted farm. It's got some food and ammo. I can't carry it any more and my strength is too low. I'm not sure if I can make it to the camp.

Trader: the scout that went to Agroprom to spy on the military was ambushed by bandits very close to the camp, in a wagon on the side of the road. Kill the bandits, take the scout's flash drive and take it to the trader.
